MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY14 postcode area of Malpas affecting properties in Wettreins Lane and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:05pm. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:14pm on the 20th April 2021.
